original_text: When the men of Israel saw that they were in trouble (for the people were hard pressed), the people hid themselves in caves and in holes and in rocks and in tombs and in cisterns,
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들이 위급함을 보고 절박하여 굴과 수풀과 바위 틈과 은밀한 곳과 웅덩이에 숨으며

sentences.original_text: When the men of Israel saw that they were in trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 그들이 곤경에 처한 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: for the people were hard pressed
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 심하게 압박을 받고 있었기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: the people hid themselves in caves
